channel.title: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)
channel.description:
BattleScape 317.
1: Dragon claws special with the RS 40-20-10-11 formula or w/e. (Not always same hits tho :P, just the formula) 2: *SOLVED* teleall command. 3: Is there any program better than hamachi that basically does the same without or with less limits? 4: *SOLVED* How to add models to BattleScape. 5: *SOLVED MYSELF* How to fix rushing for BattleScape?
Best if you have had some experience with a BattleScape 317 base. Any helpful links will be appreciated.
[b]Btw: I don't "need" these, I won't die if no-one helps but still.. :)[/b]

item.title: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“rogerr, post:12, topic:350527”]if someone could teach me how to add dragon claw spec to a project insanity source ill pay them 25$ on paypal please help![/quote]1; Why the fuck did you bump this?
2; You aren’t allowed to pay for services.

Read full topic

item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

Thnx for #2, just had 2 minor case sensitive bugs but now it works fine.
And for #1, I myself don’t prefer Dclaws either but it attracts players, I wouldn’t want them to be OverPowered tho.

Read full topic
item.source: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)

item.title: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

[quote=“illslayu, post:9, topic:350527”]Like I said above, I sux @ combat system… sorta…

OFF TOPIC: Tho don’t look at me like I can’t do anything at all, I made a drop party command that drops specific items in a specific area, I created a NPC that uses range, ice barrage and food, I have created some weapon special attack effects, I remade the poisoning system for pvp (didn’t bother remaking it for PVN…) I have fixed up the defender mini task checking (1st checks for a rune defender in ur inventory then in your hand then goes to addy, and so on.) I added ZGS and SGS (server side), I fixed up the AGS and BGS gfx (client side) I added a few emotes (whip, 2h stances, gs specials and some random ones) I remade void and veracs effect (hit through aromur and pray now it even supports items in inventory and item combinations for bigger % of effect chance) also I have created a NPC that switches weapons but it came out a bit buggy so I removed that part…[/quote]Too many words for tasks that take so little.

  1. Don’t fuck up BattleScape even more.

  2. for(Player allz : Server.s.playerHandler.players) { if(allz != null) { Client all = (Client) allz; all.teleportToX = absX; all.teleportToY = absY; all.heightLevel = heightLevel; } }

  3. Port 80, however you WILL be restricted to internet access and it is extremely easy for a hacker to screw you up.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

Like I said above, I sux @ combat system… sorta…

OFF TOPIC: Tho don’t look at me like I can’t do anything at all, I made a drop party command that drops specific items in a specific area, I created a NPC that uses range, ice barrage and food, I have created some weapon special attack effects, I remade the poisoning system for pvp (didn’t bother remaking it for PVN…) I have fixed up the defender mini task checking (1st checks for a rune defender in ur inventory then in your hand then goes to addy, and so on.) I added ZGS and SGS (server side), I fixed up the AGS and BGS gfx (client side) I added a few emotes (whip, 2h stances, gs specials and some random ones) I remade void and veracs effect (hit through aromur and pray now it even supports items in inventory and item combinations for bigger % of effect chance) also I have created a NPC that switches weapons but it came out a bit buggy so I removed that part…

You have to fix the methods so they fit your server, Its very easy. And… What the fuck do you mean about the d claws spec, What i did for my battlescape server, was took the dds spec and doubled it.

item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

No, I mean I already get errors in the compiler… Not that I’m stupid enough to try use a staff command with a normal account…
The code does not fit my server, it fits with delta and devo 7 and some richscape source.

Btw, I can only find claws spec for delta and PI…

Read full topic
item.source: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)

item.title: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

teleall command should work fine, i tested it on my server with 2 players online and they teleported to me.

  1. You might not have playerRights of 3 or higher
  2. You modified the code
  3. You have another teleall or xteleall command
  4. trying changing equalsIgnoreCase to startsWith

I cant and wont help with question 1, Its spoonfeeding and the search button CAN find the formula. If you cant find it, then you gotta make your own.

Read full topic
item.source: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)

item.title: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)
item.dc:creator: @illslayu illslayu
item.description:
@illslayu wrote:

@usman555:

  1. Don’t tell me to use the “search” button, I have tried it b4 and its sorta misleading.
  2. Copyed it from delta? Anyways it doesn’t work, I tried to fix but ye, guess what, i failed.
  3. Thnx i’ll check that when I have some time.
  4. Thnx agin, it sounds fair to me, I’ll try it.

I still need help for 1 and 2, and maybe 3.

Read full topic
item.source: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)

item.title: Some stuff 4 BattleScape please?(I decided to put my questions in a single post)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

  1. Search button

  2. [code]
    if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“teleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
    for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
    if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
    client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

                 castOn.toX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
             castOn.toY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
         }
     }
 }[/code]

  3. Theres no port that doesnt require forwarding. Port forwarding is simple, just follow the automatic portforwarding guide in the tutorials section (its stickied because its awesome)

  4. You can only add a gzipped model because thats the only type that the client can read.

next section that tutorials failed on

  1. what?
  2. read the other number 2, see the for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
  3. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html
  4. You need to add them into the client in the correct file type

Read full topic
